name: Descend (topromen, emurrell2000, Lam_Bregaani, Eric Osorio)
description:
Descend is a mobile game for Android devices - simply download and unpack the APK to play!

Descend is a casual mobile game with simple controls and massive replayability. The game is cute and appealing to look at, that is dead-simple to pick up and start to play, but the challenge quickly ramps up. The deeper the player goes, the pressure starts to mount - literally and figuratively! The game gets harder, with the player moving faster and the enemies giving less time to respond. Feel that pressure grow yourself as you play: Descend.


R Mike Livingston: Project Lead and Design 
https://rmikelivingstondesign.wordpress.com/

Randall Forehand: Vision and Programming

Asia Gonzalez: Art and Character Design

Tyrell Whitby: Art and Character Design

Erik Murrell: Design and Aesthetics

Austin Menard: Design and Level Layout

Eric Osorio: Code and Sound Design
